snippet: The beautiful game will definitely be a little uglier without Neymar, who broke a vertebra against Colombia, although there may be some comfort to Brazilians in knowing that they are still in the tournament.
abstract: Christopher Clarey On Soccer column holds that Brazilian team's so-called beautiful game will be a little uglier without injured star Neymar, who has been the soul and one consistent threat of a Brazilian team that has had its shaky moments in 2014 World Cup.
lead_paragraph: The beautiful game will definitely be a little uglier without Neymar, who broke a vertebra against Colombia, although there may be some comfort to Brazilians in knowing that they are still in the tournament.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Neymar's Injury Is a Crushing Disappointment in Brazil
headline.main: On a Beautiful Day for Brazilians, an Unexpected Dark Cloud
headline.print_headline: On a Beautiful Day for Brazilians, An Unexpected Dark Cloud
